mapper.select: select ROLE_NAME from T_ROLE inner join T_USER_ROLE on T_ROLE.ID = T_USER_ROLE.ROLE_ID inner join T_USER on T_USER_ROLE.USER_ID = T_USER.ID where LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, hire_date, job_id FROM employees WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEES ( employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, hire_date, job_id ) VALUES( #{employeeId}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{hireDate}, #{jobId})
